    A

    addQuestion(Question) - Method in class com.project.Helpers.CategoryManager
    Add a question into the manager under its category key.
    addTurnSummary() - Method in class com.project.Gameplay.GameEngine
    Append a turn summary line to the report helper describing the current player's action and the outcome.
    addTurnSummary(String) - Method in class com.project.Helpers.ReportHelper
    Append a single turn summary line to the in-memory report buffer.
    answerQuestion() - Method in class com.project.Gameplay.GameEngine
    Read the player's answer, evaluate correctness, update scores and category state, then advance to the next player's turn.
    AnswerQuestionCommand - Class in com.project.Commands
    Command that asks the game engine to accept and process an answer for the current question.
    AnswerQuestionCommand(GameEngine) - Constructor for class com.project.Commands.AnswerQuestionCommand
    Create an AnswerQuestionCommand bound to the provided game engine.

    B

    beginTurns() - Method in class com.project.Gameplay.Gameplay
    Initialize the `GameEngine` using the selected players and case id, then drive the main turn loop until no categories remain.

    Validate and construct a `Question` instance from the supplied builder state.

    G

    GameCommand - Interface in com.project.Commands
    Simple command interface used by the game invoker.

    Core game engine that tracks players, categories, questions and scores.

    Construct a GameEngine with the provided category manager, players, console IO and report helper.

    GameInvoker - Class in com.project.Gameplay
    Central invoker used to execute game commands and record event logs.
    GameInvoker(String) - Constructor for class com.project.Gameplay.GameInvoker
    Create a GameInvoker which records commands and annotates log entries with the provided case identifier.
    Gameplay - Class in com.project.Gameplay
    Orchestrates the gameplay loop: loading questions, player setup, turn execution and graceful shutdown (report + event log generation).
    Gameplay(GameInvoker, ConsoleIO) - Constructor for class com.project.Gameplay.Gameplay
    Create a new Gameplay coordinator.
    GameTermination - Class in com.project.Gameplay
    Responsible for finalizing game outputs such as report and event log files.
    GameTermination(ConsoleIO) - Constructor for class com.project.Gameplay.GameTermination
    Create a GameTermination helper bound to the provided console IO.
    generateEventLog(EventLogHelper) - Method in class com.project.Gameplay.GameTermination

    GenerateEventLogCommand(GameTermination, EventLogHelper) - Constructor for class com.project.Commands.GenerateEventLogCommand
